text: Leonard Starr (October 28, 1925 â€“ June 30, 2015) was an American cartoonist, comic book artist, and advertising artist. He was best known for creating the newspaper comic strip On Stage and reviving Little Orphan Annie. ==References== ==Other websites== *Leonard Starr official site *NCS Awards Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists Category:People from New York City
